Toledo.Glass City Con:
Glass City Con (formerly GarasuNoShiCon) is an annual two-day anime convention held during July or August at the SeaGate Convention Centre in Toledo, Ohio. In Japanese, "GarasuNoShiCon" means "Glass City Convention".


== Programming ==
The convention typically offers anime screenings, an artist alley, a cosplay competition, card and tabletop games, video games, LARP (live action role playing), a rave, vendors, and workshops.
